sections.content:
Question:
Is there an evaluation board for the RA4L1?
Answer:
The Evaluation Kit, EK-RA4L1, enables users to effortlessly evaluate the features of the RA4L1 MCU group and develop embedded systems applications. The users can utilize rich on-board features along with their choice of popular ecosystems add-ons to bring their big ideas to life.
The kit includes Segment LCD Board for direct drive segment LCD applications.
EK-RA4L1 v1 kit orderable part number: RTK7EKA4L1S01001BE
Suitable Products
RA4L1
